name: Blood Frenzy Style
description: You have learned to turn your pain into power, whipping yourself into a blood frenzy whenever you take damage.
prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +1, aquatic subtype.
benefit: While you are using Blood Frenzy Style, you gain a +2 bonus to your Strength and Constitution, and you take a â€“2 penalty to AC.
special: You can enter Blood Frenzy Style only as an immediate action when you take damage. You cannot enter this style as a swift action, as with other style feats.
